definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: During the first half of this year, the country added a total of 26 million new Internet users.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，全國的網民增加了兩千六百萬。

sentences.english: The patient individualizes commonly blemish, psychogenic disorder duration is in less than of half an year.
sentences.chinese: 病人一般有個性缺陷，心理障礙持續時間在半年以內。

sentences.english: The seasonal sea level change is of annual period and the second oscillation is of semi-annual period.
sentences.chinese: 月平均海面以年週期振動爲主，其次是半年週期。

sentences.english: The new Asia-Pacific Hub is expected to be fully operational the first half of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 新的亞太集散中心預期在2009年上半年全面運營。

sentences.english: Captain Harville had taken his present house for half a year;
sentences.chinese: 哈維爾上校租下現在這幢房子，打算居住半年。

sentences.english: Prototype new products six months after the trial run before the technical evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 新產品樣機試運行半年後，方可進行技術鑑定。

sentences.english: The level of knowledge is checked every half a year when pupils have to pass exams.
sentences.chinese: 學生們每半年參加一次考試來檢查所掌握知識的水平。

sentences.english: This is the second such event I attended during my six months in London.
sentences.chinese: 這是我到任半年以來第二次出席中資機構的喬遷儀式。

sentences.english: They had been told only one month but drag the half-year cycle drawback.
sentences.chinese: 當初被告知只需一個月的退稅週期卻拖了近半年。

sentences.english: For the first half of the year, complete long-term projects and tie up loose ends.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，完成長期的計劃並處理好細枝末節。

sentences.english: This is the half-yearly meeting of the interim committee.
sentences.chinese: 這是臨時委員會的半年度會議。

sentences.english: Have a regulatory capital adequacy ratio of 200 percent or higher for the half-year period immediately prior to the date of application.
sentences.chinese: 申請日前半年自有資本適足比率應達百分之二百以上。

sentences.english: Located in Suzhou Xiangcheng Economic Development Zone, we plan to start our operation in 2016.
sentences.chinese: 公司計劃於2016年下半年開始正式運營生產。

sentences.english: The first half of 2006 flights per week to 780 sorties .
sentences.chinese: 2006年上半年每週進出港航班爲780架次。

sentences.english: Performance was much stronger during the latter half of the six-month reporting period.
sentences.chinese: 更強的性能在下半年的申報期內六個月。

sentences.english: The work ate up all his time.
sentences.chinese: 建橋工作用了半年的時間。

definition: a few years/several years/how many years
one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
